!Collector Marsha: We will play a game of Rock/Paper/Scissors with you for an ante of 10 nebulite orbs - you bet 10 orbs to begin the game. If you win you receive 20, if you draw you get your 10 orbs back, and if you lose I keep all orbs. [Quest _343_UndertheShadowoftheIvoryTower 30934-03.htm|"Ok I'm ready!"]
